entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
